description:
Some custom HA code has been added to nova to help with glance failures, but a more generic approach should be decided upon and applied to all appropriate outbound HTTP connections.

This is a technical debt type bug more than a functionality bug.
title: Clean up custom glance access HA code

comments.content:
Jesse: perhaps - I don't really have an implementation in mind, but I was just thinking we have a common problem here, and tagging something as technical-debt might be a good way to capture that.  Basically we have lots of places we make HTTP calls to other services and they are all very inconsistent in how they retry, what happens when they fail, etc.  Would be good to unify that.  Happy to turn this into a blueprint (or just drop it) if that's better.

Brian W: it is referring to that and the http connections around it.
